# Basisfunktionen für Elemente
## Hermite Polynome
```{julia}
fig = Figure(size=(600, 600))
Axis(fig)
feplot(fig[1, 1], makeelement(:hermite, QHat, conforming=true)) |> feconf()
feplot(fig[1, 2], makeelement(:hermite, QHat, conforming=false)) |> feconf()
fig
```
